project.name: monoco
project.description: A Model and a NoSQL Database for Components

monoco.name: monoco
monoco.description:
This module is the main module of monoco.
It inits monoco metamodel and loads monoco core system.

monoco-behavior.name: monoco-behavior
monoco-behavior.description:
This module manages the behaviors of all components. 
A behavior is a mecanism that allow users to add actions that will be executed 
when a specific state of a component will change.

monoco-component.name: monoco-component
monoco-component.description:
This module manages the components. 
It is the factory of all the components that are created by monoco.

monoco-db.name: monoco-db
monoco-db.description:
This module manages monoco database.
monoco database is a micro NoSQL Database that contains:
- collections to store documents (schemas, types, components, ...) and
- APIs to import or export documents.
monoco Database is closely linked to monoco metamodel and monoco components because:
- all operations done by monoco database must be compliant with the model before being finished,
- insert operation automatically creates a component and
- remove operation automatically destroy a component.

monoco-helper.name: monoco-helper
monoco-helper.description: This module contains all the functions used by all the modules.

monoco-log.name: monoco-log
monoco-log.description: This module contains all the functions that write a log.

monoco-metamodel.name: monoco-metamodel
monoco-metamodel.description:
This module manages monoco metamodel.
monoco metamodel loads schemas and types, analyzes them and creates the component classes and related MonocoDatabaseCollections.

monoco-state.name: monoco-state
monoco-state.description: This module manages the states of all thecomponents.

monoco-workflow.name: monoco-workflow
monoco-workflow.description:
This module manages the workflow of monoco. It behaves like a workflow engine.
It checks if the change of status of a component is valid to be executed. By valid, it means that:
- the state is valid for the component,
- the input (i.e. parameters) of all actions for the state are compliants with the model and
- the output of all actions are compliants with the model.
If an error occurs, the workflow will call the error state of the component and monoco.
If the error can break the consistency of the current system, the worklow will stop.

monoco-system.name: monoco-system
monoco-system.description: This module contains monoco core system.

monoco-behavior.name: monoco-behavior
monoco-behavior.description:
This module manages the behaviors of all components. A behavior is a mecanism that allow users to add action that will be executed 
when a specific state of a component will change.

monoco-component.name: monoco-component
monoco-component.description:
This module manages the components. 
It is the factory of all the components that are created by monoco.

monoco-db.name: monoco-db
monoco-db.description:
This module manages monoco database.
monoco database is a micro NoSQL Database that contains:
- collections to store documents (schemas, types, components, ...) and
- APIs to import or export documents.
monoco database is closely linked to monoco metamodel because:
- all operations done by monoco database must be compliant with the model before being finished,
- insert operation automatically creates a component and
- remove operation automatically destroy a component.

MonocoDatabaseCollection.name: MonocoDatabaseCollection
MonocoDatabaseCollection.description:
A collection of documents managed by monoco.
Internal collections manage core objects of monoco (schema, type, ...).
Public collections manage components of the same class.

monoco-helper.description: This module contains all the functions used by all the modules.

This module manages the workflow of monoco. It behaves like a workflow engine.
It checks if the change of status of a component is valid to be executed. By valid, it means that:

- the output of all actions are compliants with the model.
If an error occurs, the workflow will call the error state of the component and monoco.
If the error can break the consistency of the current system, the worklow will stop.

monoco-system.description: This module contains monoco core system.

classitems.description: Add a behavior that will be stored in monoco database.
classitems.name: add

params.name: state
params.description: the state on which the action will be executed

params.name: action
params.description: the action to execute when the component will have a specific state

params.name: useCoreAPI
params.description: if true, monoco core modules will be injected as parameters of the action (default false)

params.name: core
params.description: if true, behavior can not be exported

return.description: id of the behavior created in monoco database

classitems.description:
Remove a behavior with its id or remove all the behaviors for a specific state
of the component.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: params
params.description:
{String} componentId id of the component
{String} state state of the component
{String} behaviorId id of the behavior (optional))

classitems.description: Get all the actions of a behavior for a component.
classitems.name: getActions

return.description: all the actions that have to be executed for a specific component and state

classitems.description: Remove all the behaviors stored in memory.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Remove a behavior with its id from the memory.
classitems.name: removeFromMemory

classitems.description: Listen to an event.
classitems.name: listen

classitems.description: Send a message into the channel.
classitems.name: send

return.description: true if the message was sent

classitems.description: Create a component from its configuration.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: Get a component by its id.
classitems.name: get

classitems.description: Find components with a query.
classitems.name: find

return.description: components found

classitems.description: Check if the component has for class name className.
classitems.name: isInstanceOf

return.description: true if the component has for class name className

classitems.description: Remove all the components store in memory.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Destroy a component from its id.
classitems.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.description: id of the component to destroy

return.description: if the component has been destroyed

classitems.description: Find a document into the collection.
classitems.name: find

return.description: Array of documents that map the query

classitems.description:
Insert an new document into the collection.
Before inserting the document, monoco checks that the document is compliant with its class definition.
Then, after inserting it, we create the component.
classitems.name: insert

return.description: array of id created

classitems.description: Update documents into a collection.
classitems.name: update

params.name: query
params.description: query to find the documents to update

params.name: options
params.description: {Boolean} upsert true if we create a document when no document is found by the query

return.description: Number of documents updated

classitems.description:
Remove a document from the colllection.
When a document is removed, the component is destroyed.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: query
params.description: query to find the documents to remove

return.description: list of documents id removed

classitems.description: Count the number of documents in the collection.
classitems.name: count

return.description: number of documents in the collection

classitems.description: Create a new {{#crossLink "MonocoDatabaseCollection"}}{{/crossLink}}.
classitems.name: collection

classitems.description: monoco database store that list all the collections.
classitems.name: store

classitems.description: Dump the database.
classitems.name: dump

return.description:
the dump of the database. The dump is an object that contains:
{Object} schemas the schemas store in the database
{Object} types the types store in the database
{Object} behaviors the behaviors store in the database
{Object} components the components store in the database

classitems.description: Import/Export a monoco system into/from the database.
classitems.name: system

return.description: the id of the imported monoco system or the current monoco system

classitems.description: Export a monoco sub-system.
classitems.name: subsystem

return.description: a stringified monoco sub-system

example:
$db.subsystem({"schemas":{"name":"Person"}}); // filter export on schemas
$db.subsystem({"types":{"name":"address"}}); // filter export on types
$db.subsystem({"behaviors":{"component":"laure"}}); // filter export on behaviors
$db.subsystem({"components":{"Person": {"country": "France"}}}); // filter export on components
$db.subsystem({"schemas":{"name":"Person"},"components":{"Person": {"country": "France"}}}); // combine filters

classitems.description: monoco instance.
classitems.name: monoco

classitems.description: Set the state of a component.
classitems.name: set

params.name: id
params.description: component id on which change the state

params.name: state
params.description: the new state of the component

classitems.description: Get the state of a component.
classitems.name: get

return.description: the state of the component.

classitems.description: Remove all the states of the components from the memory.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description:
Change the state of a component. Worklow:

0. Check if the component has not been destroyed
1. Check if the state is a method or an event
2. Search if there is a behavior with an action for the new state
3. If so, get the action(s)
4. Check if the conditons on input are compliant with the metamodel
5. Call the action(s)
6. If not an of event, check if the conditons on input are compliant with the metamodel
7. If all is ok, the state of the component is updated
8. Return the result
classitems.name: state

params.name: params
params.description:
params to change the state
{String} component id of the component
{String} state state of the component
{Array} data parameters to send to the action

classitems.description: Stop the workflow engine.
classitems.name: stop

params.name: params
params.description:
parameters
{Boolean} error true if the stop of the workflow is due to an error (default false)
{String} message error message to log (default '')

classitems.description: Restart the workflow engine from the last state.
classitems.name: restart

classitems.description: Check if conditions on input are compliant with the model before calling the action.
classitems.name: checkParams

return.description: true if condition on input are compliant with the model

classitems.description: monoco core system
classitems.name: system
